entry.content: Agreed! Obviously "Ocelot" isn't ready for release yet, so it's premature to judge it, but there's some work to be done between now and October. I lose control of my mouse pointer very frequently, for a couple of seconds at time. My system has 4GB RAM, so I think it might have something to do with memory management as well as consumption, but I'm not terribly knowledgeable in this area. Still, there's a lot to like about Ocelot -- I just can't relate to the Ubuntu haters out there.
